entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow early this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
